title: Marks & Spencer — Enterprise Commerce Modernization
shortDescription: Protize worked with Marks & Spencer to drive enterprise-wide technology modernization across multiple portfolios. The engagement focused on upgrading architecture, improving delivery velocity, and enabling a scalable, experimentation-ready digital platform.
challenge: ShopHub's legacy platform struggled with poor performance, outdated UI, and scalability issues. They needed a modern solution that could handle high traffic while providing an excellent user experience.
solution: We rebuilt the entire platform using Next.js and Node.js with a microservices architecture. Implemented advanced caching strategies, optimized database queries, and created a modern, responsive design with seamless checkout flow.

title: Broomberg — ERP/CRM Modernization, Team Build & Scale Enablement
shortDescription: Protize supported Broomberg’s growth journey by building and leading a focused engineering function, modernizing internal operations technology, and strengthening delivery practices.
challenge: MediCare needed a HIPAA-compliant mobile solution for patient health monitoring with real-time doctor consultations and secure data management.
solution: Developed a cross-platform app using React Native with end-to-end encryption, integrated wearable device data, and implemented video consultation features with AI-powered health insights.

title: Zoopla — Property Platform Modernization & Engineering Transformation
shortDescription: Protize collaborated with Zoopla to guide large-scale engineering transformation across multiple products and teams.
challenge: InvestSmart required an intuitive dashboard to visualize complex financial data while maintaining high performance with real-time updates.
solution: Designed and developed a data-rich dashboard using React and D3.js with WebSocket connections for real-time updates, custom charts, and AI-powered investment recommendations.

title: Enterprise Cloud Migration
shortDescription: Large-scale migration of on-premise infrastructure to AWS cloud with zero downtime.
challenge: TechCorp needed to migrate their entire on-premise infrastructure to the cloud while maintaining 24/7 availability and ensuring data security.
solution: Executed a phased migration strategy using AWS services, implemented Infrastructure as Code with Terraform, and set up comprehensive monitoring and auto-scaling.

title: EduLearn Online Platform
shortDescription: Interactive e-learning platform with live classes, assessments, and progress tracking.
challenge: EduTech needed a comprehensive learning management system with video streaming, real-time collaboration, and automated grading.
solution: Built a scalable platform using modern web technologies with integrated video conferencing, interactive quizzes, automated grading, and detailed analytics for teachers and students.

title: FoodieHub Delivery App
shortDescription: On-demand food delivery app with real-time tracking and smart recommendations.
challenge: FoodieHub wanted to compete with major delivery platforms by offering better user experience, faster delivery, and personalized recommendations.
solution: Created a feature-rich mobile app with AI-powered recommendations, real-time order tracking, optimized delivery routing, and seamless payment integration.
